title: Changing InDesign CS2 Default Preferences?
content:
I’m frustrated. Every time I open a new document in InDesign, all the units revert to Picas. I don’t use Picas (maybe someday, but doubtful). Does anyone know how to reset the default document so I can change the units to inches instead?

Also, while I’m at it, I might as well change some other preferences. Anyone want to make a suggestion on other things I should probably change, maybe the baseline grid and increments.

 [‹ ITC Avant Garde Gothic Not Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040311/http:/typophile.com/node/36627 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dramatic, slightly scary and a little intimidating: any ideas? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021040311/http:/typophile.com/node/36614 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Asvetic

comments.content:
Change the preferences without a document open.  
That should make the changes global.
Thanks, that worked great. The frustration is easing off now.
